official-title.#text:
Making supplemental appropriations for the Department of
		  Health and Human Services for awarding grants to States to promote universal
		  access to trauma care services provided by trauma centers and trauma-related
		  physician specialties.

cosponsor.#tail:
)
			 introduced the following bill; which was referred to the
cosponsor.#text: Mr. Danny K. Davis of Illinois

short-title.#text:
Trauma Relief Access for Universal
			 Medical Assistance Act
